name: foundryvtt-actor-link-indicator
description: Adds a toggle button in Actor title bar to quickly toggle new tokens to be linked or not. Does not affect existing tokens.

scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp ./actor-link-indicator.js dist/ && cp ./actor-link-indicator.css dist/ && cp ./README.md dist/ && cp ./CHANGELOG.md dist/ && cp ./LICENSE.md dist/ && cp ./module.json dist/ && cp ./THANKS.txt dist/
scripts.copyWin: mkdir dist && copy module.json dist && copy actor-link-indicator.js dist && copy actor-link-indicator.css dist && copy README.md dist && copy CHANGELOG.md dist && copy LICENSE.md dist && copy module.json dist && copy THANKS.txt dist
